description.description: A short description of the population

level.description: Whether the item is a single individual, or a population

name.description: A name for the item, useful to identify it later

owner.description: A single related resource. Can be either a URI or set of nested resource data.

population.description: The identifier (or URI) of the population object to which the item belongs.

size.description: If the item is a population, the number of individuals or biomass

stage.description: The stage of the item, to be selected in the list of allowed values

traits.description: A list of traits values indentifiers (or URIs) that were measured on this item.

units.description: Units in which the population size is measured
